remarks: An atom covers the zero subspace.  ( ~ atcv0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatcv0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatcv0.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcv0.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lsatcv0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcv0.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatcv0 $p |- ( ph -> { .0. } C Q ) $.
